title: What to know: What's happening with Trump and the Kennedy Center?
shortDescription: The president announced last week major overhauls that included naming himself the new chairman of the cultural center.

title: Trump, Musk purge thousands of federal workers
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and DOGE head Elon Musk cut thousands of probationary positions after only 3.3% of federal workers took Trump's buyout offer.

title: Trump bars federal funds at schools with COVID-19 vaccine mandates
shortDescription: Trump signed an order barring federal funds from going to schools and universities that require COVID 19 shots. But the impact will likely be minimal.

title: Eric Adams continues to push for Trump immigration priorities in NYC
shortDescription: New York City officials said Mayor Eric Adams looked like a hostage. The collateral was New Yorkers.

title: Post misrepresents 2019 survey results about Trump as new | Fact check
shortDescription: Both the image and the survey it's based on are from 2019 and are unrelated to the first weeks of Trump's second presidential term.

title: Photos show Trump's 2023 mug shot framed outside the Oval Office
shortDescription: Donald Trump's mug shot, which was taken after he was arrested on election racketeering charges in Georgia in 2023, was seen hanging in the White House.

title: RFK Jr. and Trump's MAHA Commission: What to know
shortDescription: On Thursday, Trump signed an executive order establishing the Presidentâ€™s Make America Healthy Again Commission. Robert F. Kennedy Jr. will chair it.

title: Ohio judge blocks law requiring fetal remains be buried, cremated
shortDescription: A Hamilton County judge said the law, passed in 2020, is unconstitutional under Ohio's abortion rights amendment.

title: Thousands of federal workers fired as Trump, Musk escalate purge
shortDescription: Thousands of recently-hired federal workers have been terminated as President Donald Trump and Elon Musk escalate efforts to purge the workforce.

title: From 'crazy SOB' to 'he wants peace': Trump flips the Putin script
shortDescription: President Trump says Russia's leader Vladimir Putin is ready to sit down for Ukraine peace talks. Is that a good idea?

title: Boyz II Men push Congress to pass act protecting artists
shortDescription: The R&B group whose ballads were a staple of the '90s met with lawmakers this week in an effort to get performers paid for their songs on the radio.

title: Trump moves to slap tariffs on nearly every nation | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: RFK Jr. was sworn in Thursday as Secretary of Health and Human Services. | The Manhattan U.S. Attorney resigns over Eric Adams' dropped charges.

title: Trump's agenda takes a big step forward on Capitol Hill
shortDescription: It's the first step in passing Trump's agenda, but the bill must clear additional gauntlets.

title: A 'virtual HBCU' thrives as Trump dismantles DEI
shortDescription: Americans can enroll in free courses at the rapidly-growing HillmanTok University, a 'virtual HBCU' that launched on TikTok in late January.

title: Post wrongly claims video shows Trump at Super Bowl LIX | Fact check
shortDescription: The video is miscaptioned. The video shows Trump at the 2020 College Football Playoff title game, not the Super Bowl.

title: Trump moves for global reciprocal tariffs
shortDescription: Donald Trump's planned reciprocal tariffs would match the fees other countries impose on U.S. imports, including tariffs and taxes.

title: Image of fan raising middle fingers at Trump is from 2023 | Fact check
shortDescription: An image of a fan raising middle fingers at Trump is miscaptioned. It was taken at a college football game on Sept. 9, 2023, in Iowa.
